author: KOAMNewsNowcom KOAMTV
title: House fire in NW Joplin, heavy smoke and flames, defensive fire - NewsBreak
text:
9 hours ago House fire in NW Joplin, heavy smoke and flames, defensive fire House fire in NW Joplin, heavy smoke and flames, defensive fire
JOPLIN, Mo. (KOAM) — About 7 p.m. Wednesday evening reports of a structure fire in the 100 block N Maple alerted E-911.
Joplin Police and Fire responded along with METS.
THE RESIDENCE IS JUST SOUTH OF MAPLE AVE AND A STREET. THE ROAD WAY ENDS IN A DEAD END RECENTLY PAVED CULDESAC.On scene JFD declared defensive fire at a single story residence heavily involved with fire. Within minutes the majority of active flames were under control.
On our observation it appears the fire spread from the driveway where a trailer had burned, and with the slight breeze present this evening fire extended to the exterior of the home.
House fire in NW Joplin, heavy smoke and flames, defensive fire House fire in NW Joplin, heavy smoke and flames, defensive fire
No one was inside or outside the residence. We do not believe the home has utilities but it has signs of occupants (laundry on the clothes line and freshly used adult potty chair in the yard).
The Joplin Fire Marshal responded to investigate which is normal protocol in the city of Joplin.
This residence is about two blocks east of 1st and Schifferdecker. Watch for updates here on KOAM News Now, Joplin News First. Click here to save our news tab as a bookmark on your phone . Check back often for story updates and new articles we post 24/7 as news is happening.
